title: Urgent help!!
content: So I might end up PES CSE this yr 2024-25, and I am thinking for a partial drop for IIT, would I be able to make some time in 1st yr for JEE, urgent helpp, please help me out....much appreciated....

comments.body:

DM if you got the answer to it.

partial drop this late from pes  
sounds like a disastrous combo to me tbh  
focus on academics in pes and you can get a tier 1 job
Search this subreddit, you'll find answers to your question.

i tried to take partial drop last year, i had called a few colleges to ask them if i can leave after first year cause  i got to know from many places that if you leave in between you will have to pay all four years fees , only then they will return your original docs . idk about pes, and i am not spreading any fear . but please once confirm this before making the decision .

All the best !
You can't really get away with having your feet in two different boats. The odds are stacked against you.
